studentsSay.name: Yamini Gaur
studentsSay.story: Coding Blocks was an amazing experience for me. I belong to the electronics department and had a little experience in coding but I think it has helped me think things through in a much more analytical manner. Coding is important no matter which branch you are in. It gives you a better understanding about how to approach a problem.

studentsSay.name: Ansh Sachdeva
studentsSay.story: It was an amazing experience! i got no words to explain the emotions of satisfaction, joy and happiness i achieved after completing this course. sir is such an amazing person, and i am completely positive that he was one of the best teacher who ever taught me. A young man with complete knowledge of his subject, along with a great experience in both the job line and teaching.

studentsSay.name: Samarth Jain
studentsSay.story: My journey in the world of Competitive Programming started with the Bootcamp at Coding Blocks, which turned out to be a changing point in my life. The immense amount of knowledge I got during the course did not only develop my interest but also made me pursue this field later. A special thanks to Shubham bhaiya, Mayank bhaiya and Prateek bhaiya for being the guiding lights in my journey and always motivating us to follow our passion!

faqs.ans: Anyone! The Coding Blocks Scholarship Program is open to everyone who wants to become a software engineer.
You need to register for the scholarship exam, post which we will inform you via email about the scholarship you will receive based on your performance in the exam.

faqs.ques: Do I need to pay anything for this scholarship exam?
faqs.ans: No. This is a completely free of cost scholarship exam.

faqs.ques: What should I prepare for before giving this scholarship exam?
faqs.ans: We suggest brushing up your Aptitude and Logical Reasoning for the Beginner Courses, and Algorithms and Basic Coding for our Advance Courses.

faqs.ques: Will I get a certificate after this scholarship exam?
faqs.ans: Yes, but you need to attempt the test in order to receive the certificate.
